sense.def:
A sentiment
je odnos do nečesa, občutek ali mnenje.

seg.quote: These sentiments were generally echoed by other speakers at the meeting.

sense.def:
Sentiment
je čustveno stanje kot razneženost, zaljubljenost ali žalost, ki vpliva na človekovo vedênje.

seg.quote: I'm worried that you might be doing it out of sentiment. Out of affection for me.
